import React from 'react'; import './BeActive.css'; const BeActive = () => { return (

Be Active

After receiving support and connecting with resources, the next crucial step is to actively engage in pursuing your goals. This journey requires more than just accessing services; it demands your active participation and determination.

Imagine all the pathways and possibilities that await you. These resources can open doors, but it's your commitment and effort that will propel you forward. Every step you take, no matter how small, is a testament to your strength and resilience.

Each accomplishment along this path should be cherished and celebrated. Whether it's learning a new skill, overcoming a challenge, or making meaningful connections, each milestone marks progress and deserves recognition.

Remember, this journey is yours to shape. Embrace the opportunities before you and take pride in your achievements. By being active in this process, you not only fulfill your goals but also inspire others with your determination and spirit.

Listen to Taisha's words:

Be Active and Celebrate Your Achievements

Being active in pursuing your goals is essential for progress and fulfillment. Each step forward should be cherished, and every accomplishment celebrated. Here are some positive and supportive resources:

  • • Reddit "r/Blind" Subreddit - Join discussions like "Positivity check-in: share your wins from this month" to celebrate achievements and find encouragement from others.
  • • VisionAware Forums - Engage with a supportive online community focused on vision loss, where you can share successes and gain inspiration.
  • • American Council of the Blind Community Events - Explore events and gatherings that promote active participation and community involvement for individuals with vision loss.
); }; export default BeActive;
